docs.snippet: Wells Fargo's board of directors slashed the bonuses and other compensation of its CEO and seven other top executives on Wednesday, a little more than a week after the board publicly fired four senior managers amid an investigation into the bank's...
docs.lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo's board of directors slashed the bonuses and other compensation of its CEO and seven other top executives on Wednesday, a little more than a week after the board publicly fired four senior managers amid an investigation into the bank's sales practices.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Cuts Pay for CEO, Other Top Executives
headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo Cuts Pay for CEO, Other Top Executives

docs.snippet: Public companies will be required to make it easier for investors to locate exhibits attached to their financial filings by including hyperlinks, under a new rule adopted on Wednesday by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission....
